text: Aza wooɠulani Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma, ná-GALAGI, é GALA falini ɠani: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, é ɠula è ʋolu, nu nɔpɛ ge la zooga é ʋa ɓɔ zeemaalɔi nu ʋa zɛbɛsu nui laalɔɠɔma. Ʋa, è ɓɔ gi ʋa mu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gá-ƓALAGI, mazɔlɔɔ ɗa ɠa gi ʋoluzeizu è ʋa, è-laaseigi ɠa gi liizu la bɛbɛ wolai nii laalɔɠɔma. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ɠa è ga gá-ƓALAGI, mina kɛ nu vului ʋa pilɛ sɔlɔɔ è ma!»
